title: Obituary: Sister John Gabriel Kostelnik / Nun who devoted life to teaching
text:
Published By: Pittsburgh Post - Today 
Sister John Gabriel Kostelnik, a longtime teacher at St. Sebastian School in Ross who lived a robust religious life for 76 of her 93 years, ...
